title: Infinite Contact
description: Through transmissions from his higher self, explains not only the enigma of religion but also several other paradoxes in our present day society. UNARIUS stands UNiversal ARticulate Interdimensional Understanding of Science. Unarius teaches people a better Way, for it must be understood that the material world as it is now presented is only the beginning of any man's evolution, from the primitive reaches and beginnings of his existence which can be called man, wherein he is starting that never-ending cycular pattern of interplay with the Infinite Creative Substance of all the seen and invisible cosmos.
author: Ernest L. Norman
